content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "read_file" command to retrieve the top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Ver√•s Larsen from the file "top_kayaking_routes.txt". The routes are listed in the following order: Lofoten Islands, Helgeland, Geirangerfjord, Jotunheimen, Aurlandsfjord, Rondane National Park, Sognefjord, Voss, Hardangerfjord, and Telemark Canal. I also received safety tips for kayaking and a link to visitnorway.com for more information. I used the "google" command to search for the best kayaking routes in Sweden and received a list of websites.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "top_kayaking_routes_sweden.txt", "text": "Top 5 kayaking routes in Sweden:\\n1. Stockholm Archipelago - 150 km, easy to moderate difficulty\\n2. G\\u00f6ta Canal - 190 km, easy difficulty\\n3. Stora Le - 60 km, moderate difficulty\\n4. Klar\\u00e4lven River - 100 km, easy to moderate difficulty\\n5. Vindel River - 350 km, moderate to difficult difficulty"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
